column4: I probably should mention I've successfully installed it before, but was having problems getting the integrated video (gma900) to display at my lcd monitor's native res (16x10).. so I bought a cheap nvidia graphics card
and I'm doing a fresh reinstall since I hadn't configured anything
hehe :)
I was wondering if there's a way to configure software raid during install actually.. or would I have to use the server install CD and do it manually
I think I have the same video card as you do
I searched the forums and used 915resolution and modelines, but no joy.. so just went and got a real video card
I have the white macbook
I think it got the intel gma card
are you running in native 12x9 or whatever it is?
native12x9? what do u mean?
Intel Corporation Mobile 945GM/GMS/940GML Express Integrated Graphics Controller
got that
the video bios in the macbooks is probably correct though.. my problem is it wasn't with my diy PC
native resolution for the laptop's display.. 1200x900 pixels.. whatever the exact number is :)
oh, yea. it is
I'm using 915resolution
it didn't work for me :(  I just get the display saying "out of range"
can you  tell me th eexact resolution from xorg.conf?
mine is 1680x1050

check the hor and ver refreshrate also
